page.title: 16ARMED FORCES IN CARLTON
page.content:
INTERVIEW AT TERRITORIAL ARMY DEPOT
Q. HOW LONG HAVE THE TERRITORIAL ARMY BEEN IN CARLTON? A. SINCE 1938. Q. HOW MANY PART TIME SOLDIERS HAVE YOU GOT? A. 130 PART TIME SOLDIERS FROM VARIOUS RANKS. Q. HOW MANY STAFF HAVE YOU GOT? A. NINE PERMANANT STAFF AND FOUR CIVILIAN MECHANICS. Q. WHAT REGIMENT IS THIS DEPOT CONNECTED TO? A. 17/21ST LANCERS. Q.WHAT HAPPENS HERE ON A NORMAL DAY? A. MAINTANANCE PLANNING AND CLEANING OF VEHICLES. Q.WHAT IS ROLE OF THE TERRITORIAL ARMY IN CARLTON? A. IT ACTS AS A SECOND LINE UNIT FOR THE BRITISH ARMY IN GERMANY. Q. WHAT WOULD HAPPEN IF A MILITARY EMERGENCY OCCURED? A. ALL PERSONNEL WOULD BE CALLED TO THE BASE ON STANDBY.
